contentList.content:
Attacks with weapons which are not Two-Handed deal [1], unless their normal damage is higher. The damage of these attacks may scale with either your Strength or your Dexterity. This can be toggled at any time.

Additionally, you are able to utilize your Bonus Action in order to make an unarmed strike.
Gain an additional <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.

This <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag> is considered an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Unarmed Attack Roll</LSTag>. As such, it rolls using your <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag>, depending on which is higher.

Utilize your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag> to cast Spells which require an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>, rather than <LSTag Tooltip="SpellSlot">Spell Slots</LSTag>. The cost of a Spell is equal to one Ki Point per level of the Spell that you cast. In addition, your unarmed based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and damage receive a bonus equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="SpellcastingAbilityModifier">Spellcasting Ability</LSTag>. This can be toggled at any time.

Affected creature can utilize their <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag> to cast Spells which require an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>. In addition, their unarmed based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and damage receive a bonus equal to their <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Wisdom Modifier</LSTag>.

Gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Projectile_FangsOfTheFireSnake">Fangs of the Fire Snake</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FistOfUnbrokenAir">Fist of Unbroken Air</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShapeTheFlowingRiver_IceBlock">Ice Block</LSTag>, and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_WaterWhip">Water Whip</LSTag>.
Conjure a flaming projectile and strike your foe from afar. Your next melee attacks deal an additional [1].
Affected creature's fists are flickering with flame. Its melee attacks deal an additional [1].
Conjure a gale in the shape of a fist which crashes into targets, forcing them back by [1] should they fail a Strength based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.

Conjure a climbable block of ice which you can use to block paths and traverse your surroundings. Enemies starting their turn within [1] of the block will potentially lose 50% of their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> and take [2].

Affected creature potentially takes [1] while starting their turn within [2] of the nearby <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShapeTheFlowingRiver_IceBlock">Ice Block</LSTag>. Upon taking damage by the Ice Block, they will lose 50% of their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> for the rest of their turn.
Affected creature has lost 50% of their <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag> for the rest of their turn.
Conjure a current of water with which to pull a target toward you by [1] should they fail a Strength based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.
This action utilizes an unarmed based <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> while also functioning as a <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag>.

When dealing damage with a Spell or <LSTag Tooltip="Cantrip">Cantrip</LSTag>, infuse your spirit with the same element for the rest of your turn. Dealing further damage while infused will deal additional elemental damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Wisdom Modifier</LSTag>.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Bludgeoning damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Slashing damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Piercing damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Acid damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Cold damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Fire damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Force damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Lightning damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Necrotic damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Poison damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Psychic damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Radiant damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature deals an additional +[1] Thunder damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Spells cast with <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag> make their <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Upon a successful killing blow on an enemy with a Spell cast using <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag>, restore one point of Ki. This effect can trigger once per turn.

When you use <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag> to cast a damage dealing Spell, gain <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to that type of damage until the beginning of your next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Bludgeoning damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Slashing damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Piercing damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Acid damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Cold damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Fire damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Force damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Lightning damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Necrotic damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Poison damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Psychic damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Radiant damage until the beginning of their next turn.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag> to Thunder damage until the beginning of their next turn.
With the unpredictable lurches of a tippler, you sway through every battle, frustrating foes with carefully executed movements concealed beneath a façade of incompetence.

You are immune to the negative effects of being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TIPSY">Tipsy</LSTag>, and all positive effects are doubled. Upon consuming alcohol, you recover one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point</LSTag>.

Upon drinking alcohol, you immediately <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash">Dash</LSTag>. While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TIPSY">Tipsy</LSTag>, you will not provoke <LSTag Tooltip="OpportunityAttack">Opportunity Attacks</LSTag>.
Dealing damage causes your target to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag> for three turns.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TIPSY">Tipsy</LSTag>, you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TIPSY">Tipsy</LSTag>, all enemies make <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you with <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>.

Upon taking damage by a melee attack while <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TIPSY">Tipsy</LSTag>, you immediately fall <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>. Enemies have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag> when targeting you while Prone, and standing up requires no <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>. Upon standing back up, your next instance of damage will always roll as a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>.
Affected creature will roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> on their next instance of damage.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag>, deliver two hits in rapid succession. If your target is Inebriated, this action will potentially knock them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="UNCONSCIOUS">Unconscious</LSTag> for one turn, removing the condition.
Throw bottles of alcohol as a free action, causing all who get a taste to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag>.

While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag>, belch a breathtakingly pungent scent so debilitating that it may rob those affected of their senses, driving them <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="MADNESS">Mad</LSTag>.
You specialise in unarmed combat, using your hands and your control of ki to inflict grievous wounds.
You specialise in unarmed combat, using your hands and your control of ki to inflict grievous wounds.
Deliver two lightning fast blows and possibly knock your target <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="PRONE">Prone</LSTag>.
Deliver two lightning fast blows and possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DAZED">Daze</LSTag> your target.
Deliver two lightning fast blows and possibly push your target [1] away.
While unarmed, you may cast the standard variant of <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttackDual">Flurry of Blows</LSTag> as an <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Action</LSTag>.
Deliver a debilitating blow to your target, possibly <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="STUNNED">Stunning</LSTag> them.

The natural attunement you hold over your Mind, Body, and Soul strengthens your unarmed abilities. Depending on which paradigm you choose to attune to, you deal additional Psychic, Necrotic, or Radiant damage. These can be toggled at any time.
Your hands interrupt the flow of Ki to your enemies' minds. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Your hands sap the Ki from your enemies' bodies. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Your hands become infused with Ki drawn in from outside your body. Your unarmed attacks deal an additional [1].
Hit a creature with your bare fists, forcing the Ki in your targets body to <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KI_RESONATION">Resonate</LSTag> with yours.
You can then force the Ki to explode with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_KiResonation_Blast">Ki Resonation: Erupt</LSTag>.
Detonate the Ki of a creature <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KI_RESONATION">Resonating</LSTag> with you, damaging the creature along with all enemies within [1] of it.
Detonate the Ki of a creature <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="KI_RESONATION">Resonating</LSTag> with you, damaging the creature along with all enemies within [1] of it.
The Ki within the affected creature is resonating with a nearby Monk. The Monk can use <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_KiResonation_Blast">Ki Resonation: Erupt</LSTag> to make it explode.
Once per turn, killing an enemy will restore one of your <LSTag Tooltip="Action">Actions</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Actions</LSTag>.
Teleport directly to a nearby shadow and gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> until the end of your turn.
While <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hidden</LSTag>, this action does not cost a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point</LSTag>.
Affected creature has <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>.
Wrap yourself and nearby allies in shadows to become <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CLOAK_OF_SHADOWS_MONK">Invisible</LSTag>. Allies in unobscured areas will remain visible.
Teleport to an enemy from a <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hide">Hidden</LSTag> position, striking them with the psychic ferocity of the shadows themselves.
If casting this action results in a killing blow, it is considered a free action and you will remain Hidden.

While obscured in shadow, you may <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="HIDING">Hide</LSTag> as a free action. Additionally, you can see normally in darkness, both magical and non-magical, to a distance of [1].

Upon landing a killing blow with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShadowStrike_Instant">Shadow Strike</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShadowStrike_Instant_Unarmed">Shadow Strike: Unarmed</LSTag>, casting these actions again will always result in a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> for the rest of your turn.

Affected creature will only roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> when damaging another creature with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShadowStrike_Instant">Shadow Strike</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_ShadowStrike_Instant_Unarmed">Shadow Strike: Unarmed</LSTag>.
Enemies within [1] of you have their peripheral vision severely reduced.
Affected creature is severely reducing nearby enemies' peripheral vision.
Affected creature has had it's peripheral vision severely reduced.
Dealing damage to another creature <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SILENCED">Silences</LSTag> them for one turn.
Dealing damage to another creature <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BLINDED">Blinds</LSTag> them for one turn.

Feel the breadth of your experiences circulating within you.
Within every storm, serenity harmoniously waits for its moment.

When an enemy fails to damage you with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> and a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point</LSTag> in order to retaliate with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FlurryOfBlows">Flurry of Blows</LSTag>.
When an enemy fails to damage you with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>, retaliate with <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FlurryOfBlows">Flurry of Blows</LSTag>.

When you successfully roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> against an enemy, restore one of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag>. This effect can trigger once per turn.

On any successful <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, gain a +1 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> until you successfully avoid an attack. This effect can stack and will reset at the beginning of each of your turns.

Affected creature will avoid damage more easily. Their <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag> increases by 1 for each stack of Dance of Flowing Water. This effect will reset at the beginning of each of their turns.

When a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> is made against you, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> to reduce the damage by -1d12 plus your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Dexterity Modifier</LSTag> and your level. If reduced to zero, you may use a <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point</LSTag> in order to throw the projectile back at your aggressor.

When a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> is made against you, reduce the damage by -1d12 plus your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Dexterity Modifier</LSTag> and your level.

When <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="Interrupt_DeflectMissiles">Deflective Reflex</LSTag> has reduced the damage of a <LSTag Tooltip="RangedWeaponAttack">Ranged Weapon Attack</LSTag> to zero, throw the projectile back at your aggressor.

When a spell or effect would deal half damage on a successful <LSTag Tooltip="Dexterity">Dexterity</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>, it deals no damage if you succeed, and only half damage if you fail.

When a creature fails an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against you, gain a +1 bonus to Attack Rolls during your next turn. This effect can stack and will reset at the end of each of your turns.

Affected creature will land <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> more easily. The number required is reduced by 1 for each stack of Fist of Crushing Rock. This effect will reset at the end of each of their turns.

When you succeed in an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag>, the number you need in order to roll a <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag> is reduced by 1. This effect can stack and will reset at the end of each of your turns.

Affected creature will roll <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hits</LSTag> more easily. The number required is reduced by 1 for each stack of Focused Stream. This effect will reset at the end of each of their turns.
Gain status immunity to being <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>, or restrained in any way.
<LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_FlurryOfBlows">Flurry of Blows</LSTag> deals additional damage equal to your <LSTag Tooltip="AbilityModifier">Wisdom Modifier</LSTag>.
Gain an additional [1] of <LSTag Tooltip="MovementSpeed">Movement Speed</LSTag>.
Upon a successful killing blow against an enemy, restore one of your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Points</LSTag>. This effect can trigger once per turn.
When dealing damage, you ignore bludgeoning <LSTag Tooltip="Resistant">Resistance</LSTag>.

When an enemy fails to damage you with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>, use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to retaliate with a swift <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedStrike_Monk">Unarmed Strike</LSTag>.

When an enemy fails to damage you with a <LSTag Tooltip="MeleeWeaponAttack">Melee Weapon Attack</LSTag>, retaliate with a swift <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedStrike_Monk">Unarmed Strike</LSTag>.
While in combat, regenerate one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point</LSTag> every three turns.
Affected creature will recover one <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="KiPoint">Ki Point</LSTag> when this status expires.
Gain <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on all <LSTag Tooltip="Wisdom">Wisdom</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.
While <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="DRUNK">Inebriated</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="TIPSY">Tipsy</LSTag>, gain a +2 bonus to your <LSTag Tooltip="ArmourClass">Armour Class</LSTag>.

When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally within [1], use your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to retaliate with a swift burst of air pressure, dealing damage equal to an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Strike</LSTag> and sending them flying [3] if they fail a <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.

When an enemy makes an <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Roll</LSTag> against an ally within [1], retaliate with a swift burst of air pressure, dealing damage equal to an <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Target_UnarmedAttack">Unarmed Strike</LSTag> and sending them flying [3] if they fail a <LSTag Tooltip="Strength">Strength</LSTag> based <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throw</LSTag>.

<LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> against you have <LSTag Tooltip="Disadvantage">Disadvantage</LSTag>, and you have <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag> on Dexterity <LSTag Tooltip="SavingThrow">Saving Throws</LSTag>.

Gain <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Dash_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind: Dash</LSTag> and <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Disengage_StepOfTheWind">Step of the Wind: Disengage</LSTag>. These actions may be cast for free once per turn.

Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, you may expend your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="ReactionActionPoint">Reaction</LSTag> in order to restore your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
Upon landing a killing blow or <LSTag Tooltip="CriticalHit">Critical Hit</LSTag>, restore your <LSTag Type="ActionResource" Tooltip="BonusActionPoint">Bonus Action</LSTag>.
